typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		active as string,
		description as string,
		inserted_by as string,
		inserted_date as timestamp,
		pk_source_system as string,
		updated_by as string,
		updated_date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> StaSourceSystem
StaSourceSystem select(mapColumn(
		sou_key = pk_source_system,
		sou_description = description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveUnusedColumns
RemoveUnusedColumns derive(sou_key = 'N/A',
		sou_description = 'Not Applicable') ~> NotApplicable
NotApplicable aggregate(groupBy(sou_key),
	sou_description = first(sou_description)) ~> NotApplicableRow
RemoveUnusedColumns, NotApplicableRow union(byName: true)~> UnionWithNotApplicable
UnionWithNotApplicable derive(top_key = 'ALL',
		top_description = 'All Source Systems') ~> DeriveTopLevel
DeriveTopLevel sink(input(
		PK_KEY as string,
		CPT_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CPT_NUMBER as integer,
		INSERTED_BY as string,
		DATE_INSERTED as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['m_dim_source_system'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimSourceSystem
